profile.name: Chris McCord
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Elixir Enthusiast | Database & Process Expert
profile.summary: Highly motivated developer with a passion for building scalable web applications using Elixir. Proficient in database management, process registry management, and Go programming language.
profile.company: Based on the provided information, I would recommend GoFundMe as a potential employer for Chris McCord

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer at GoFundMe
description: Designed and implemented high-performance web applications using Elixir and Phoenix.
Developed and maintained large-scale database systems for efficient data storage and retrieval.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Built custom web applications using Elixir, Go, and Lua.
Collaborated with clients to understand project requirements and deliver high-quality solutions.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to the development of Ecto, Req, and Phoenix frameworks.
Participated in code reviews and ensured high-quality standards for open-source projects.

experience.title: Low-Level Socket Operations
description: Developed low-level socket operations using Elixir.
Experimented with different networking protocols and optimized performance.
